CustomField.description: The unique Salesforce identifier of a user/profile/role. Please note: If you migrate this from one Salesforce organisation to another, the IDs most probably will become obsolete, with the exception of having them defined based on a full-copy sandbox that only has data pulled from production.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unique Salesforce identifier of a user/role/profile.
CustomField.label: Mapped Record Id
